title: Not Bound To His Fate (19P14)
text:
Set:	Ages End
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gondor
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Strength:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be a [Gondor] Man. Each time bearer wins a skirmish, you may transfer this condition to another [Gondor] Man. At the end of each turn, if bearer is not Aragorn, return this condition to hand.
Rarity:	P
